thread.title: Disgraced Australia cricket captain Smith in tears after apologising for ball-tampering incident

title: Disgraced Australia cricket captain Smith in tears after apologising for ball-tampering incident
text:
Disgraced Australia cricket captain Smith in tears after apologising for ball-tampering incident 2:16pm BST - 01:30 
Australia cricket captain Steve Smith breaks down in tears saying he will 'regret this for the rest of my life' after admitting his part in a ball-tampering scandal ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
